title: L4 GTCM Arbitration Thresholds
description: Configuration file defining the dynamic thresholds used by the L4 governance layer to accept or reject a code evolution commit based on L3 metric scores.

threshold_version.description: Version identifier for the current policy configuration.

S02_Risk_Maximum.description: Maximum allowable score for S02 (Systemic Risk).

S03_Safety_Minimum.description: Critical minimum score for S03 (Safety Compliance). Usually set high (e.g., 0.95).

S04_Efficiency_Minimum.description: Minimum required index for S04 (Resource Efficiency), enforced by Austerity Mandates.
